hww-config:gift.title: Poison Apple Pie
hww-config:gift.itemDescription: TRAP - Adds 10 minutes to your opponent's husband work timer.
hww-config:gift.description: Oh no, It's a poisoned apple pie and you fed it to your husband! Add 10 minutes to his work timer.

hww-config:gift.title: Explosive MeatLoaf
hww-config:gift.itemDescription: TRAP - Adds 15 minutes to your opponent's husband work timer.
hww-config:gift.description: Boom! It's the dreaded exploding meatloaf! Add 15 minutes to his work timer.

hww-config:gift.title: Devil's Food Cake
hww-config:gift.itemDescription: TRAP - Adds 10 minutes to your opponent's husband shopping timer.
hww-config:gift.description: Your neighbor distracted your husband with this devil's food cake. Add 10 minutes to his shopping timer.

hww-config:gift.title: Sexy Bomb Gingerbread
hww-config:gift.itemDescription: TRAP - Adds 15 minutes to your opponent's husband shopping timer.
hww-config:gift.description: Your neighbor gave your husband sexy bomb gingerbread! Add 15 minutes to his shopping timer.

hww-config:gift.title: Love Affair Beer
hww-config:gift.itemDescription: TRAP - Adds 20 minutes to your opponent's husband work and shopping timer.
hww-config:gift.description: That neighbor gave your husband love affair beer. Add 20 minutes to his work and shopping timers!

hww-config:gift.title: Deadly Shrimp Cocktail
hww-config:gift.itemDescription: TRAP - Adds 30 minutes to your opponent's husband work and shopping timer.
hww-config:gift.description: Your husband ate deadly shrimp cocktail at your neighbor's party! Add 30 minutes to his work and shopping timers!

hww-config:gift.title: Mac And Cheese
hww-config:gift.itemDescription: GIFT - Your friend's husband works 1 min faster for 24 hours.
hww-config:gift.description: It's delicious mac and cheese! Your husband will work 1 min faster for the next 24 hours.

hww-config:gift.title: Fruit Cake
hww-config:gift.itemDescription: GIFT - Your friend's husband earns 2x game bucks for 1 hour.
hww-config:gift.description: A fruit cake?! Your husband seemed to like it. Your husband earns 2x game bucks for 1 hour.

hww-config:gift.title: Bowl of Salad
hww-config:gift.itemDescription: GIFT - Your friend's husband earns 2x game bucks for 2 hours.
hww-config:gift.description: Your neighbor is health conscious and gave you a bowl of salad. Your husband earns 2x game bucks for 2 hours.

hww-config:gift.title: Cup Cake
hww-config:gift.itemDescription: GIFT - Your friend's husband has a +2% chance to return with a rare item on his next shopping trip.
hww-config:gift.description: Everyone loves cupcakes, including your husband. On his next shopping trip he has a +2% chance to return with a rare item.

hww-config:gift.title: Muffin
hww-config:gift.itemDescription: GIFT - Your friend's husband has a +5% chance to return with a rare item on his next shopping trip.
hww-config:gift.description: Your husband likes to be the muffin man. On his next shopping trip he has a +5% chance to return with a rare item.

hww-config:gift.title: Strawberry Cheesecake
hww-config:gift.itemDescription: GIFT - Your friend's husband earns 2x game bucks for 6 hours.
hww-config:gift.description: Sweet strawberry cheesecake! Your husband ate it all. He earns 2x game bucks for 6 hours.

hww-config:gift.title: Clam Chowder
hww-config:gift.itemDescription: GIFT - Your friend's husband works 1 min faster for 12 hours.
hww-config:gift.description: A hot bowl of clam chowder. Your husband loved every bite. He will work 1 min faster for the next 12 hours.

hww-config:gift.description: Good old fashioned chicken casserole! One of your husband's favorites. Your husband earns 2x game bucks for the next 24 hours.

hww-config:gift.title: Roasted Turkey
hww-config:gift.itemDescription: GIFT - Your friend's husband shops 1 min faster for 12 hours.

hww-config:gift.title: Mint Chip
hww-config:gift.itemDescription: GIFT - Your friend's husband has a +10% chance to return with a rare item on his next shopping trip.
hww-config:gift.description: Your husband loves mint chip. On his next shopping trip he has a +10% chance to return with a rare item.
